Why TeleDirect Makes Sense as Your Marketing Call Center

Inbound Marketing Services | Marketing Call Center Assistance | Outsourced Advertising Call Center Expertise | Contact TeleDirect Today!

Your firm may regard call center marketing activity as a challenge. But at TeleDirect, we think it’s an opportunity. That’s because your call and support center often sits at the perfect crossroads to merge actionable sales intelligence with helpful metrics.

While your marketing department is constantly looking for useful information to act upon, they don’t always have up-to-the-second data. Meanwhile, your marketing call representatives are focused on simply collecting information, without the “big-picture” perspective needed to optimize sales-related opportunities. That’s where TeleDirect’s smart, sales-oriented analytics come into play.

Available actionable data and everyday tasks obscuring marketing call center optimization...connecting these two endpoints of your advertising call center isn’t just a nice-to-have; it’s critical to achieve enhanced customer service, gather timely data, exceed profit expectations and scale your marketing call center quickly, easily and efficiently.

TeleDirect works with your whole-business model and marco-level objectives to capitalize on call center marketing opportunities you never knew existed – because big business improvements are often realized from small detail analysis. Our inbound marketing services and solutions aren’t just for your marketing call center; they’re designed to benefit all aspects of your business, both directly and indirectly related to your call and information centers.

With an efficient call center advertising and marketing system in place like TeleDirect, your business will:

  • Boost business prospects. From touting existing services to offering new ones, your marketing call center offers endless opportunities to increase visibility, advertise efficiently and explain the unique features and benefits of your product or service. TeleDirect’s inbound marketing services are all about promoting your brand, automatically and all the time!
  • Generate extra revenue. To establish additional revenue streams, your firm requires a next-level approach to the ever-changing business world. TeleDirect turns your marketing call center into an informative, efficient and enlightening portal – which ultimately helps drive extra profits! What’s more, our inbound marketing services also include order processing assistance to optimize profits.
  • Cement established business relationships – and establish new ones! Enhanced call center marketing capability allows your business to better handle customer complaints and also enables your customers to discover new products & services. From long-term clients to tomorrow’s newest customers, it’s time to rethink help center advertising. And TeleDirect’s world-class customer service platform can help bolster business in this highly competitive area!
  • Enjoy a front-facing customer service portal. Advertising call centers are focused on marketing, but TeleDirect doesn’t think that’s ALL they’re about. With our upgraded call center system in place, your firm can explore all-new ways to improve your customer service capability.
  • Focused customer retention tactics. To complement our inbound marketing services, our outbound platform includes customer retention strategies to reduce attrition & churn, all while ensuring your short-term clients become long-term, profitable relationships!

Call Center Marketing Solutions
